## UnitOfMeasure of interest
- 1 GB/Month
- 1 GiB/Hour 
- 1 GiB/Month
- 1 TB/Month
- 1/Hour ?
- 1/Day ?
- 1/Month
import pyspark.sql.functions as F
from enum import Enum

class StorageType(Enum):
    StorageAccount = "Storage Account"
    ManagedDisk = "Managed Disk"    
    NetAppFiles = "NetApp Files"
    Backup = "Backup"
    SQLDatabase = "SQL Database"
    SQLManagedInstance = "SQL Managed Instance"
    CosmosDB = "Cosmos DB"
    MySQLDatabase = "MySQL Database"
    PostgreSQLDatabase = "PostgreSQL Database"

HOURS_PER_MONTH = 730
GIB_PER_TIB = 1024
TIB_PER_PIB = 1024
GIB_PER_GB = 0.931322575
HOURS_PER_DAY = 24

UNIT_OF_MEASURES = [
    '1 GB/Month',
    '1 GiB/Hour',
    '1 GiB/Month',
]

STORAGE_ACCOUNT_RESOURCE_IDS = [
    'microsoft.storage/storageaccounts',
    'microsoft.classicstorage/storageaccounts'
]

NETAPP_CAPACITIES = [
    'Standard Capacity',
    'Ultra Capacity',
    'Premium Capacity',
    'Backup Capacity'
## Load application data
##### Used to resolve the organisational unit

app_path = "abfss://usage@s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/applications/processed.parquet"
app_df = spark.read.format('parquet').load(app_path)
app_df = app_df.select('AppID', 'OrgUnitLevel0', 'OrgUnitLevel1', 'OrgUnitLevel2')
## Load disk size mapping
##### Mapping used to determine disk size for managed disks

disk_size_path = "abfss://usage@s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/services/storage-account-disk-sizes.csv"
csv_options = {'header' : True,
                'delimiter' : ';',
                'quote' : '"',
                'escape' : '"'}
disk_size_df = spark.read.options(**csv_options).csv(disk_size_path)

disk_size_df = disk_size_df.withColumn('Size', F.split(F.col('DiskSize'), ' ').getItem(0))
disk_size_df = disk_size_df.withColumn('Unit', F.split(F.col('DiskSize'), ' ').getItem(1))
disk_size_df = disk_size_df.withColumn('DiskSizeGiB', 
    F.when(F.col('Unit') == 'TiB', F.col('Size') * 1024)
    .otherwise(F.col('Size'))
## Load usage data
cost_path = f'abfss://usage@s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/20240401-20240430/Extended_v3_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_20240401-20240430.parquet'
cost_df = spark.read.format('parquet').load(cost_path)
## Estimate storage volumes per service

# Define service masks
is_storage_account = (F.col('MeterCategory') == 'Storage') & (F.col('ResourceType').isin(STORAGE_ACCOUNT_RESOURCE_IDS)) & (F.col('UnitOfMeasure').isin(UNIT_OF_MEASURES))
is_managed_disk = (F.col('MeterCategory') == 'Storage') & (F.col('ResourceType') == 'microsoft.compute/disks') & (F.col('MeterName').contains('Disk')) & (F.col('UnitOfMeasure') == '1/Month')
is_managed_disk_redundancy = (F.col('MeterCategory') == 'Storage') & (F.col('ResourceType') == 'microsoft.compute/disks') & (F.col('UnitOfMeasure').isin(UNIT_OF_MEASURES))
is_sql_db = (F.col('MeterCategory') == 'SQL Database') & (F.col('MeterName').contains('Data Stored')) & (F.col('UnitOfMeasure').isin(UNIT_OF_MEASURES))
is_sql_mi = (F.col('MeterCategory') == 'SQL Managed Instance') & (F.col('MeterName').contains('Data Stored')) & (F.col('UnitOfMeasure').isin(UNIT_OF_MEASURES))
is_netapp_files = (F.col('MeterCategory') == 'Azure NetApp Files') & (F.col('ResourceType') == 'microsoft.netapp/netappaccounts') & (F.col('MeterName').isin(NETAPP_CAPACITIES)) & (F.col('UnitOfMeasure').isin(UNIT_OF_MEASURES))
is_backup = (F.col('MeterCategory') == 'Backup') & (F.col('MeterName').contains('Data Stored')) & (F.col('UnitOfMeasure').isin(UNIT_OF_MEASURES))
is_cosmos_db = (F.col('MeterCategory') == 'Azure Cosmos DB') & (F.col('MeterName').contains('Data Stored')) & (F.col('UnitOfMeasure').isin(UNIT_OF_MEASURES))
is_mysql = (F.col('MeterCategory') == 'Azure Database for MySQL') & (F.col('MeterName').contains('Data Stored')) & (F.col('UnitOfMeasure').isin(UNIT_OF_MEASURES))
is_postgres = (F.col('MeterCategory') == 'Azure Database for PostgreSQL') & (F.col('MeterName').contains('Data Stored')) & (F.col('UnitOfMeasure').isin(UNIT_OF_MEASURES))

# Define storage type for each relevant service
storage_df = cost_df.withColumn('StorageType',
    F.when(is_storage_account, StorageType.StorageAccount.value)
    .when(is_managed_disk, StorageType.ManagedDisk.value)
    .when(is_managed_disk_redundancy, StorageType.ManagedDisk.value)
    .when(is_sql_db, StorageType.SQLDatabase.value)
    .when(is_sql_mi, StorageType.SQLManagedInstance.value)
    .when(is_netapp_files, StorageType.NetAppFiles.value)
    .when(is_backup, StorageType.Backup.value)
    .when(is_cosmos_db, StorageType.CosmosDB.value)
    .when(is_mysql, StorageType.MySQLDatabase.value)
    .when(is_postgres, StorageType.PostgreSQLDatabase.value)
    .otherwise(None)
)

storage_df = storage_df.where(F.col('StorageType').isNotNull())

# Aggregate quantities per day - used to derive the storage volume
storage_df = storage_df \
    .select('Date', 'StorageType', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'UnitOfMeasure', 'MeterName', 'AppID', 'Quantity') \
    .groupBy('Date', 'StorageType', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'UnitOfMeasure', 'MeterName', 'AppID') \
    .agg(F.sum('Quantity').alias('Quantity'))

# Lookup disk storage volumes from separate table
is_pre_allocated_disk = (F.col('StorageType') == StorageType.ManagedDisk.value) & (F.col('UnitOfMeasure') == '1/Month')
storage_df = storage_df.withColumn('DiskType',
    F.when(is_pre_allocated_disk, F.split(F.col('MeterName'), ' ').getItem(0)).otherwise(None)
)
storage_df = storage_df.join(disk_size_df.select('DiskType', 'DiskSizeGiB'), 'DiskType', 'left')

# Compute storage volume estimates from quantity
storage_df = storage_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeGiB',
    F.when(F.col('UnitOfMeasure') == '1 GiB/Hour', F.col('Quantity') / HOURS_PER_DAY)
    .when(F.col('UnitOfMeasure') == '1 GiB/Month', F.col('Quantity') * (HOURS_PER_MONTH / HOURS_PER_DAY))
    .when(F.col('UnitOfMeasure') == '1 GB/Month', F.col('Quantity') * (HOURS_PER_MONTH / HOURS_PER_DAY) * GIB_PER_GB)
    .when(is_pre_allocated_disk, F.col('DiskSizeGiB'))
    .otherwise(None)
)

storage_df = storage_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeTiB', F.col('EstimatedVolumeGiB') / GIB_PER_TIB)
storage_df = storage_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumePiB', F.col('EstimatedVolumeTiB') / TIB_PER_PIB)
# Enrich orgianisational data from Service Now based on application metadata
storage_df = storage_df.join(app_df, 'AppID', 'left')
